mapper.update: update t_conversion_rel set unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data1 = #{data1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unit_id1 = #{unitId1,jdbcType=BIGINT}, unit_name1 = #{unitName1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data2 = #{data2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unit_id2 = #{unitId2,jdbcType=BIGINT}, unit_name2 = #{unitName2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where conver_id = #{converId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select conver_id, unit_id, unit_name, data1, unit_id1, unit_name1, data2, unit_id2, unit_name2, company_id from t_conversion_rel where conver_id = #{converId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
